item.title: 99 Beers on the wall!
item.dc:creator: @Texasmd91 Texasmd91
item.description:
@Texasmd91 wrote:

Well i decided to learn Scar just for the hell of it. not cheating on rs, just something to have some fun with on new accounts.

well heres my first script

{.Script Info: # ScriptName = 99 Beers on the Wall # Author = TexasMd91 # Description = Singles the Beers on the wall song. # Version = 1 # Date = Friday, March 16, 2007 # Comments = |~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ | INSTRUCTIONS: | 1. Set the 3 values under "const" | 2. Open up runescape. | 3. Login and move the crosshair to the rs window | 4. Press "Run" and watch it sing the song! |~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ ```````````````````````````````````````````````````` /Script Info}

program BeerOnTheWall;

var
Bottles: integer;

const
TotalBottles = 100; //total amount of bottles to start with
SecondsToWait = 3; //how many seconds between each line
Prefix = ‘white:’; //white:, red:, flash1:, wave2:, etc.

Message1 = ’ bottles of beer on the wall, ‘;
Message2 = ’ bottles of beer.’;
Message3 = 'Take one down and pass it around, ‘;
Message4 = ’ bottles of beer on the wall.’;

procedure Beer;
begin
if Bottles = 0 then
Bottles := TotalBottles;

wait(SecondsToWait * 1000);
sendkeys(Prefix + IntToStr(Bottles) + Message1 + IntToStr(Bottles) + Message2 + chr(13));
wait(SecondsToWait * 1000);
Bottles := Bottles - 1;
sendkeys(Prefix + Message3 + IntToStr(Bottles) + Message4 + chr(13));
end;

begin
repeat
Beer;
until (false)
end.

WARNING: DO NOT USE ON AN ACCOUNT YOU WANT. THIS IS A FUN SCRIPT TO DO ON A LEVEL 3 ACCOUNT! YOU WILL BE BANNED

Read full topic
